content.detailedDescription: On july 23rd a little past 10:00 pm i went outside to view the neighborhood fireworks.The weekend of the 24th is a state holiday in utah and fireworks are as popular on this day as they are on the 4th of july.While i was outside in my backyard i noticed 4 faint objects that looked like stars very high in the sky.Three of the objects were in a straight line but at a slight angle moving across the sky.A fourth object was moving along just off to the side of the other three objects.They moved through the sky in formation from north to south.Although i could not see if it were one unit or four separate objects.They seemed to be moving at a fast motion through the sky as they began the get dimmer and dimmer until the vanished.My house is in the flight path of the salt lake city airport.Commercial aircraft are a normal occurrence flying over my house.This was not a plane or helicopter.
content.summary: Unknown lights moving through night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving south on i-95 toward home, the sky lit up blue, i thought a transformer blew i
until i looked up and saw this thing take off towards the ocean. when it took of it left an enormous green trail that stayed in the sky for about ten seconds after it was gone, before it disipated.
content.summary: Flash of blue light lit up sky, then shot out towards ocean and left a green trail that stayed in the sky before disipating

content.detailedDescription:
The folks in wise county saw something. they have first hand information.
you can contact me for their contact number and name.
content.summary: This was told to me by long time friends that live in wise county. one was a sighting another was a burst of light in the room they were sleeping in.

content.detailedDescription: My 9yr old son and i were laying on our trampoline,(in the country) at night because i wanted to see if he could locate the big dipper. as i knew where it was, we were scanning the sky directly above us. one of the brighter stars suddenly moved quickly from one point to another and stopped(moved about four fingers distance at arms length). then after about 15 or 20 seconds, it changed direction again, quickly moved snd stopped again in a second direction. after a short time it changed direction again to form a path of somewhat of a triangle. then it seemed to gradually drift(no more than that four finger length), and stayed stationary for as long as we kept our eyes on it. i pondered with my son what that could have been, and we came to the conclusion that there was nothing on earth that we know of that could have moved like that.(even though it looked the same as any other star, only a little brighter) coincidently, during the same timeframe we did see a shooting star going from the east to the west (superfast) that left a trail, not related to what we were looking at. the star or object we observed did not move again. it did not leave a trail and did not move as quickly as a shooting star. it did distinctly quickly  change direction each time after stopping all three times. it seemed as if once we were pointing at it stopped moving completely as if it saw we had seen it and it wanted to blend in. we decided to go inside to call a family member to see if maybe we we should call somebody about our sighting. they suggested the police but we felt a little silly. then we came across this website when trying to find somebody to report to. my son was a little worried because we both did witness this together and his imagination was working overtime. myself, now i have no doubt that there are things going on out there where i was always skeptial before. when we went back outside, i thought i had a refrence point as to where it was at, but we could not locate it again.
content.summary: Star quickly moved and stopped and moved again,  and again in a triangle shape and stopped, then gradually shifted and stayed stationary.

content.detailedDescription: On oct. 10, 2010 i was driving up to my driveway and happened to look up and saw this orange/ yellow pulsating sphere shaped object. at first i thought it was something for halloween, but it was not. i came right over my house and right over me. i was standing in the driveway as it passed over me, it made no sound whatsoever. it was not an airplane or helicopter. i don't know what it was, but i don't think it was from our world. the place this object was sighted is in west texas.
content.summary: Amber orange pulsating sphere shaped object  went right over my house.

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my family in the pool, floating on my back looking in the sky.

i saw a rather large circle,, much larger than a star,  moving in a staight path.  it was about 40 seconds, then i couldn't see it due to trees blocking the view.

it was a circle,  white and looked just like a cloud, only it was a circle and it moved, and the circle shape never changed. it was not a cloud, it looked different than a cloud, it was cloud like.  it moved straight like an object.  latter a plane flew over, it was a larger white plane, which i thought was odd, because all we see is small aircraft, or passenger jets.
content.summary: Moving circle  cloud like

content.detailedDescription: Saw bright light while driving up my road. stopped car saw something that had no sound go over my head
content.summary: Saw bright light while driving up my road. stopped car saw something that had no sound go over my head

content.detailedDescription: I got out of my car, looked back and up in the sky, approximately 25-30 feet from my driveway, there was this hugh object just sitting there (stationary).Since it was dark, i could not determined what the object looked like nor the exact size - all i know is that it was hugh in size.. all i saw was this opague yellow circular light. the object may have been the size of a football field.- i was in awe, saying, oh my god, oh my god. as i stared at this hugh object just sitting there, the object flew straight up, then down, then up again, then disappeared...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Hugh object in the night sky - a short  distance from my driveway. stationary, circular opague yellow light

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i went to his hometown to visit.  around 10:15pm, we sat with family around the firepit to talk.  the night was clear and full of stars; we were far from any major city.  after watching planes coming in from the east, i saw a tiny white light flying along the path of the milky way, which was horizontal.  myself and about three other family members were facing east. i said, "oh, look at the tiny white star dot going across the sky".  i thought it looked odd, but thought maybe somebody else who grew up here might have an explanation.  the tiny dot didn't blink and seemed very far away.  someone said it could be a satellite.  i watched it go from the northeast to the southeast.  then, it veered slightly up and disappeared. i said a small silent prayer and continued to enjoy the beautiful night sky.  then, i saw another one traveling the same similar direction and it, too, veered and disappeared.  then shortly afterward another went southeast going northeast.  since i didn't grow up in the area, i thought maybe these were all satellites and they must orbit going opposite directions.  then, out of nowhere, we all saw a flash of light about pennysize in comparison to the other stars, which were like sharpened pencil dots.  it flashed out of nowhere into this white circle of light, stayed large, then shrunk to a smaller size and...Well...Flew away as if into the night.  in other words, the light got small and disappeared as if it was flying away from earth.  i don't know how else to explain it.  a couple of us said, "whoa!  what was that?"  the next day, on sunday, my husband heard a helicopter in our area around 11am.  might have been a regular helicopter.
content.summary: Tiny lights; bright flash

content.detailedDescription: I was taking sunrise pictures at a public boat landing in savannah, ga, known as bell's landing.  one of the many pictures i took that morning was of a bird sitting on a wooden post.  it wasn't until i downloaded the pictures onto my computer that i noticed this object in the background.  when i first noticed the object i immediately thought of a ufo.  i cannot comment on the ufo's movements as i did not notice it until i downloaded the picture.
content.summary: Saucer like black object not noticed until picture was downloaded onto computer

content.detailedDescription: 15-18 co witnesses.Everyone felt no fear and very serene!
content.summary: 50' cigar

content.detailedDescription:
I had just dropped off my son at his dad's house in freemont around 2:30 pm yesterday, headed home on the 101n oakland, high above in the very clear blue sky was what looked like a very bright fireball which at first i thought was a blimp so i watched it...I remember the freeway at this point was clear the car in front of me was about 100 ft in front of me and another just ahead of that, the highway was pretty much straight and i was able to get a really good look at this object which was the apparent size of an aspirin in perspective of distance..It was pretty high up around the same altitude as a plane or blimp would be, which is why i kept looking to see if there were any airplane lights or a slow moving blimp, it seemed to be totally stationary neither coming or going just hovering and then what looked to me to change shape from cigar to perfect circle, then cigar, blimp, and some other shape i can't describe other than an arm reaching out of an oval, all this time it was very bright and looked to be very hot in temperature, a lot like molten lava, i was asking myself over and over of course "what is that" it's gotta be a blimp, a plane right? then it seemed to warble like a planet then it looked like it started to dim away or fade out. then i thought i could see through it, when it appeared transparent there was no color visable, the object seemed to look like a cloud or water vapor, at this time i still could dismiss it as a blimp but not an airplane as there were no other lights blinking or flashing, there also at the time seemed to be no other planes in the sky possibly only because i wouldnt have even noticed due to how bright this object was, it continued to appear to fad out only showing just the tiniest wispy, white, cloudy, semi circle, then it seemed to turn and get bright again, and then it just dissapeared, like someone turned off a light switch, no fade, but more like a flickering candle going out. i was scratching my head and just kept saying "where did it go" i looked around on the freeway again to see if i was close enough to other cars to see if maybe they were as flabbergasted as i was, i also was thinking...Those people ahead of me had to see that!!! i really seemed to be the only thing in the sky at that time...The bright fireball against a bright blue sky is hard to miss, i'm feeling very strange processing the emotional questions that keep coming up like "am i crazy?" did i see that? who do i tell,how do i report it, how do i find out if it was a weather balloon or a laser beam, i'm feeling like i'm in shock and having a hard time focusing on mundane chores.
i noted the time to be between 2:45 to 2:55pm pacific standard, i'm really interested to know if someone else saw this too and if it was a blimp....How could it disappear? i just don't get it. would be nice to put my head to rest one way or the other though. thank you for your time.
content.shape: Cigar,   Circle,   Disc,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere,   Other
content.summary: Bright fireball object in the sky over highway 101n

content.detailedDescription: I was on the sundeck above my garage at about 11:15 pm on july 28, 2011 when i saw a bright light.  what made me report it was because it was odd. normally, from my sundeck i can see aircraft making maneuvers for landings at lax. usually they head east towards my house an turn south; i can see their landing an marker lights.  occasionally, when the airport is fogged in, they fly over my house.  on this night, i see this bright light in the west slightly below arcturus? in bootes.  it moves slightly to the northwest and then brightens up and enlarges to a four-point diamond shape and then simply blinks out. no aviation marker lights were seen after the light went out; i couldn't tell what if any direction it continued to fly.  i didn't hear any sound from the light. the attitude of the light was higher the planes that i see heading from lax except when they come very close to my house; then the planes would be about the same attitude as the light. but, when they are that close, i can see that they are planes, not this light.  i don't think that it was a police helicopter with its search light on; i should have seen aviation light still when the light went out; and i should have heard it.
content.summary: Just an odd light which brighten up and grew before blinking out

content.detailedDescription: Why cant we look up archive files without having to go thru the submit section ..Com on
content.summary: Like to look up archive file

content.detailedDescription: My fiance and i were looking at the skies on july 29th 2011. it was after 11pm in rural michigan. we were just looking at the stars, constelations, looking for satalites and planes, ect. we noticed there was a lot of aitplane traffic. we thought it was unusal because we are in a small town and don't ever notice many planes flying. looking souteast we saw a thick trail about and inch long from our view. it appeared quickly in a flash, dimmed, then flashed another trail traveling horazontally to its left. we kept our eye in that area and saw a hovering craft where the trail had ended. it had multi-colred lights rotating and plusating. it hovered there for about 2 minutes. at this time it was the size of an asprin in the distance. it accended about an inch up, then begang to slowly move twords us. it traveled over our heads and continuted northwest untill it was out of our sight. as it was over our heads it was about the size of a soft ball. we don't know exactly how high it was. it was hard to referance because it was s dark, but we esstimate it was lower than a plane. it made no noise. we watched it fly over head slowly, it took about 10 minutes to fly over us. we could now see it better. it was dark and disc shaped. it had about 3 different colored lights pulsating, and a band of white lights spinning. it is hard to describe. we jumped to our feet, trying to come up with explainations and look closly to try to figure out what it was. my fiance started to look for our cell phone to take a video. it was too dark to see anything and we couldnt take out eyes off it. there is a minute video, but it is just black with audio of us freaking out. it was nothing either of us had ever seen. it seemed to at first make its entrance traveling at lightning speed, then hover for a few minutes, then slowly fly overhead. we kept staring at the skies and notced a plane came in from a new direction than anything else that night and seemed to be going the same direction as the ufo. within a minute there were two more following it. all three planes flew in that direction somehwhat close together. we saw at least 12 planes in the hour or so we were watching the skies before an after we saw the ufo. it was so big and low flying we found it hard to belive no one else saw it. we want to investigate what this was. we arn't saying it's extraterestrial. we just want to try to identify it, if possible. we reaserched the nearest air base and found it was national gaurd on the eastern edge of mi near detroit, we are on the opposite side of the state. please contact us, we would like to know the steps we need to take to investiagte. like who we can call at air bases to ask about activity/radar. thanks.
content.summary: Saw bright trail for a few seconds, then another at stars ditance. saw hovering craft when trail dimmed which then flew over slowly over us. we could see it was a spinning disc with colored lights spinning.

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep in my bed when a beam of light came through my window, this beam took me up into the air through the window and into the ship. once onboard i was in a room with three "greys" and although they spoke to me they had no mouths but i heard every word. they told me they wanted a blood sample and meant me no harm they also explained to me why they wanted the blood sample. they were very friendly and i felt very calm and was not scared. i agreed to the sample and they told me a lot of different things, i awoke after the event and was very startled even to the point i threw my pillows off the bed at my recliner, i thought it was one of them at first. for many years i dismissed this event as a dream but it always stayed with me. recently things they told me have come to be true and after this event i believe they or other alien beings continued to abduct me for some time after this event. the interior of the object was metallic in appearance and the control panels to fly the vessel was just a solid metallic panel, when you put your hand on this panel it molds to your hand and your movements work to control the ship. i never saw the outside of the ship but they did explain it was a small ship with bigger ships in the area that they dock with. i was also told other things that i would be willing to talk in depth about.
content.summary: A beam of light took me into ship[

content.detailedDescription: On a summer night in 1995, a friend and i were in the driveway of my home in overland park, ks.  i remember it being late evening, probably around 10pm.  we both clearly saw what appeared to be a blue dot moving very rapidly at about 10,000 feet in an east-northeast direction and then changing direction suddenly to the southwest and finally changing direction again to it's original heading this time climbing up out of the atmosphere.  the turns made by the craft were so sharp that it's path through the sky resembled a lightning bolt.
content.summary: Sighting of blue ufo rapidly changing direction above overland park ks.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside on my porch talking to a friend.As i was talking i thought i saw a balloon in the distance,but quickly realized it was not flying up into the sky like a balloon would.Its direction was from north to south towards my house.As it got closer i was realizing this is a circle.To me it reminded me of a basketball,but it was a dirty silver,grey,brown...Like dirt color.The thing that most intrigued me was the way it was moving.Not fast like an airplane ,but fairly slow and steady.At its closest point i asked my friend if he could see it.He looked up and could not see it.He has bad eyes.By this time i was frustrated because i wanted validation of what i was seeing.When the circle got approximately a block before my home not close to the ground,but in the sky still around a mile up it changed direction.As it started to go past the horizon of my house i saw on the very top of it...Almost looked dead center of top..I was able to see a bright light on the top of it.I ran into my house and out the garage to the front of the house.I did not see it ,but in the direction it was going there was a bunch of helicopters in the distance.
content.summary: Sitting outside talking,thought i saw a ballon floating until it moved closer.Realized it was a flying circle

content.detailedDescription: just look at the picture, this photo is available for further scrutiny.
content.summary: Just look at the picture, this photo is available for further scrutiny.

content.detailedDescription: On july 29th 2011 at around 6pm i was in my backyard smoking.  it was a partially cloudy day and i was looking at the thuderstorms aroud my house to try to photograph the lightning. when i looked up to the west i saw three(3)of what looked like black/greyish spheres flying to the south.  as i observed these spheres flying slowly more and more came into view 2-3 at a time from the north, 11 in total.  at first i thought they were a flock of birds or balloons in the wind.  that quickly changed when i saw two of the initial objects begin to fly in a way that was completely different from the others.  they seemed to weave in and out of the clouds above and to the west of them.  as they all moved south, the ones that followed did the same at about the same place in the sky.  i was amazed as to the speed and ability in which these objects move in such a manner. at this time my mother came outside and i imediately called her to see what i was seeing. i finally lost sight of the objects after about 5 minutes from the time i first saw them due to how far from me they were and the cloud cover that got thicker and darker further south of my house.
content.summary: 11 spheres flying north to south some with erratic flight paths.

content.detailedDescription:
I work late at home, so, after work tonight, i decided to go out and get a soda.  i always look up at the stars when i go out, but i have never seen anything truly strange.  i know a planet from an airplane when i look up, though i am no pilot or other 'official'.  sorry to report, i am just a normal girl going to the corner market for a sugar fix in the wee hours of the night.
this time, when i walked out and looked up, i saw a very bright, what i thought was, star.  brighter than anything in the night, i thought maybe it could be vega, or another planet visible in the summer sky. just when i wrote a mental note to go look up 'planets visible in the summer sky', this 'star' became brighter, at least twice as bright as when i first saw it... as if it were coming closer to me. 
"great, i've got a brain tumor and this is my 'phonomenon' moment," i thought. time and space completely stopped as this star grew brighter and brighter.  it was so bright, i started to look around to see if anyone else was out, surely they would see this, you could not miss it! only the guy working at the store was sweeping inside the glass doors.
i looked back up, as it never really left my peripheral, the brightness had stabilized somewhat.  it dimmed, and began to move around, not quite a figure-eight, and not quite a double-circle, but unmistakeable movement.  as it moved, a meteor shot past, under it as it danced. i am sure my jaw was on the sidewalk along with all reason i may have had before i went outside.  it's light began to fluctuate, dim, and disappear.  it was gone.
"that was wierd, i wonder wha.."  i never took my eyes off the spot in the sky, because maybe a microsecond passed, and to my astonishment, it re-appeared.  became bright as before, moving in the same pattern, and i felt... i still can't articulate that.  (as i write this the morning dawns on my shock, & i'm doing my very best to document this. i can say i felt a definite contact, a connection with something i do not know.  i must say also how very far away it was, i really thought it was a star way up there, until it moved.)
i watched it dance, return to it's original position, brighten, dim, and disappear 4 times.  the 4th, and final time it disappeared, it did not return.  for a moment at least.  my rational mind cannot explain this thing i saw. so, i looked around again, and felt like my feet had softly landed back on terra firma.  a strange feeling, and my heart pounding fast, i went into the store... because now i really needed a soda... maybe two.
the guy remarked that i was wandering a bit around the store, and i couldn't help but tell him, "sorry, but i think i just saw a real ufo out there."  he giggled, and asked me where.  i showed him where i saw it, paid, and left.  
when i went back outside, it was solid bright, pulsing, stationary in the sky, and very obvious to anyone who could look, though no one was out.  i realized it probably wasn't a good idea for a girl to be outside at 4am, unarmed, alone, looking at the sky with a bag of goodies in hand.  i also realized i couldn't explain this, and couldn't look at it anymore.
stars and planets brighten and flicker, but they don't dance around like that.  planes go in straight lines across the sky.  i do not know what this was, but it must have been huge to be seen from such a distance.
i am descending into a daze, and i feel a little nauseous.  maybe alot nauseous.  my brain tries to make sense of it, and ties in a knot.  but i felt... intelligence!  i felt conciousness from that 'star'.  that's what it was!
i have never looked for such things, and never even thought they were real since all my life i have looked at the night sky for so many hours, watching the stars, and they have never moved before.  there's got to be some high-powered telescope out there that saw this as well, it was unmistakeably something huge moving among the stars.  it's light was substantial.
this has changed me now forever.  thank you for reading my report.
content.summary: The first real ufo i have ever seen with my own eyes

content.detailedDescription:
We saw a flattened oval arrangement of lights go from west to east along the top of south mountain toward the area of homer research labs. we tried to follow it by car but were unsuccessful.

this was told to mufon f.I. 11726 on sunday, july 31, 2011.
content.summary: Witness saw odd arrangement of white lights pass overhead.

content.detailedDescription: Working security at laguna beach, ca., new housing development, midnight, very dark.  my co-worker and i saw a bright light in the sky moving from west to east.  the light stopped right above our heads.  it was glowing orange flames.  i was sure that it was a rocket from vandenberg afb just up the coast.  the object sat in the night sky for about a minute before disappearing.  my co-worker and i both agreed that the object seemed to "go up" in to space.  one minute later, two flashing red lights flying in formation appeared and stopped in the sky at the same location where the object ascended.  seconds later we heard a loud chopping sound coming down the california coastline.  we both ran toward the beach and saw a big black military helicopter with one flashing red light flying low down the coastline.  our cell phones and walkie talkie radios started ringing with everyone wanting to know what's going on.  my bosses made a big deal out of the incident.  they even checked with vandenberg afb.  nothing was ever resolved.
content.summary: Bright light moved slowly across the sky.  stopped then acended skyward.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting on our deck with 2 friends about 11pm. one of our friends noticed a bright orange ball of light coming over the trees to the side our house, moving in a straight path like a airplane would but higher and no blinking or flashing lights. we watched it go across the sky heading in a northeast direction. at first i thought it might be a satelite, but was going slow and on a very even path. as it neared the farthest point away from us, it appeared to dim a little bit and then just disappeared, as if someone had turned off a light. approximately 20 minutes later another orange ball came from the same area and repeated the above...Disappearing in the same area as the first. i work for an airline and it was not a airplane. the ball of light looked solid with defined edges. it appeared to just glide across the sky, did not change altitude during the entire time we saw either of them. did anyone else report this?
content.summary: Observed bright orange ball of light travel across the sky in a straight path then appear to slow and shink in size, then disappeared as if someone just turned of the light.

content.detailedDescription: It was a childrens birthday i stayed up late with my cousin i layed down at almost 5am then 5 minutes later she taps me,tells me come outside so then i go and she tells me to look up towards houston from our position and approximately 30-50 miles away its a pretty large light all by itself glowing i called my wife she saww it for like 3 min then went back inside my cousin then records video on her camera and thats a good picture of a large then get alittle smaller lose light for 5 seconds then reapear in the same spot it also would slowly move towads the east and at the same speed come right back i saw some times i would'nt see a bright light now it was like a cross alittle crooked and like if it was spinning then the sun was barely coming turning the skies light puple to dark blue it dissapears and 3-5 min later the skies are visibe
content.summary: It came closer then farther then gone

content.detailedDescription: We were coming out of the dollar theatre in la mirada around 11:30 pm, we were around our friends truck getting ready to leave talking about where to go eat when one of us noticed the flying saucer hovering on top of us not so far away, i and all the ppl coming out from the movie theatre saw, i was shocked, i couldnt belivev my eyes, we walked trying to see where it was heading, than the saucer made a sharp turn than no plane can make, it changed direction in a blink of an eye, the lights were going around it and flashing, like a yellowish whiteish color, wat i saw was real, it was something that will be unforgettable
content.summary: Never seen anything like it, what i saw was real

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to smoke and notice object under street light. i thought it was a bat eating insects. the flight was odd and shape to big. i got my son to come outside and look. he went toward object and it went toward him and lowerd down toward him. he went back toward our yard and the object went back to what it was doing. i went back to house and got shoes on and flash lights. i went toward object using a board to block the street light to see it better. it came toward me and above me going up and down. when flashlight shined on it it would move fast back and forth. it looked like a bare cut metal object the size of a foot wood ruler. it had a wire tail with a light from tip going toward head every so often. when looking streight up at it it looked distorted and would get thiner or wider. i would get an uneasy felling when above me. i went back to the house and found some binoculers to look at it. it just looked like a hoovering wire through binoculars. me and my 2 sons watched it from around 1:00 a.M. untill about 4:00 a.M. then my son and wife said it was there at 5:00 a.M. but when i went out at 5:30 a.M. it was gone and have not seen it since.
content.summary: Small wire like probe hovering under street light

content.detailedDescription:
On august 1st, 2011, at approx. 9:40pm, i was driving south on hwy 52 on minnesota and approx. close to 10 miles north of zumbrota, mn. i witnessed a bright object appear in the sky and went almost strait down. it fell thousands of feet in about 5 seconds. it did not streak, but appeared to fall or descend quickly. i noticed the object about 25-30 degrees to my left, starting from maybe 40 degrees above the horizon and fell below the tree-line. although i assume this was probably a meteorite, which could have been dozens of miles away, i felt i should report it anyway in case it wasn't. judging its motion while driving was a little difficult, besides the obvious nearly strait down descent. it appeared to possibly decelerate slightly, and may have maneuvered slightly as well, but this could have been due to my movement on the highway going 70mph. the object was star-like, about as bright as a very bright star. i just felt it was odd when i noticed its rapid descent, yet slow enough that it didn't streak like a common meteor. i've seen something like it once before around fort dodge, iowa about 6 years ago, but this one was much higher or closer. because of the tree-line, i was unable to see if it made contact with the ground, but it appeared it would have. the tree-line was quite some distance away, on the other side of a farm-field.

thanks!
content.summary: Bright object fell from the sky near zumbrota, mn

content.detailedDescription: I made a very similar report a few days ago. tonite around 11 pm july 31st, i was making a sandwich and went outside to cut some chives for the sandwich, walked out onto my side porch and around to the nearby garden bed on side of house. halfway there, i looked suddenly up at the sky and there was an aspirin sized object moving quickly in a straight path. not fast, but quickly. it was yellow in color, slightly orangish. it was too low to be a star. i turned my head towards the window and called my boyfriend to come and see, and turned back to look at it and there was no sign of it whatsoever. at the speed it was moving, and in the split second i turned my head away and then back, it did not have time to leave the large patch of sky that was visible. it was in the same patch of sky where i saw the last one, and moving in the same direction.
content.summary: In the same area of sky where i saw the last one, aspirin sized spherical object moving quickly in very straight line. yellow in color, slightly orange. not a satellite, not a shooting star. glowing. vanished instantly.

content.detailedDescription: I was home, friday night, and letting the dogs out before going to bed. i opened the front door and saw the object flying just over the tree tops in a straight, but very slow, flight path. i listened for any sound from the object; there was total silence. when the object went behind the pine tree-tops, i lost sight of it, so went to look out of my kitchen window so as to have a better vantage point. i didn't see it. went back to the front door to let the dogs back in and didn't see it again. the craft was triangular and had red/green/or white lights at the apex of each angle, with an amber light in the center. (i knew it was a ufo as 1. we are in the flight path of many types of aircraft flying in and out of ft. bragg so i am familiar with the different types 2. i have seen several ufo's, as a teen in the late 60's early 70's; and had a witness during the first sighting.) the next morning my husband and i went to the grocery store where we overheard the bag boy telling the cashier about the sighting he and his father had also had the night before. he said they saw 3 of the craft; i only saw one. they, also. made no noise at all. i can see i-95 from my front window so i know there had to be plenty of other people who saw this, too.
content.summary: Triangular shaped
